content.prompt: Why does Zhang Hong assume that Xiao Ming does not know about the new library schedule?

choices.label: Xiao Ming has been preoccupied with writing his thesis.
Xiao Ming has been doing an off-campus research project.
Xiao Ming had gone home for the post-exam break.
Xiao Ming just returned from a trip abroad.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
